title: It's Not Like Being Black: How Sexual Activists Hijacked the Civil Rights Movement
description: How sexual identity hijacked the Civil Rights movement.The latest threat to the church from social justice warriors is the “sexual identity” movement. First, gay activists co-opted the Civil Rights movement to promote same-sex “marriage.” Now the transgender movement is taking the LGBTQIA+ agenda to new lengths, threatening the family, the church, and the state. Worse, many evangelical leaders, eager to appease the culture, have gone along to get along.Voddie Baucham alerts believers to the dangerous alliance of gender ideology and the civil rights movement, equipping them to fight back.
author: Voddie T. Baucham Jr.
